Hi, I'm Anita Nandi

I'm currently a Principal Data Scientist at Trilateral Research.

My background is in Physics and Data Science. I've spend a lot of time dealing with data in a variety of forms and contexts, in research and industry. I've worked with lots of different methods and technologies. I also like to make random websites and games, some of which are still active and are linked to below.
